Previous

Next

Sweet dreams is an endless runner made in Unreal 4 as part of a tech and engine game jam in my university masters course. Run and get the sweet to survive as long a possible. AD to turn and avoid the obstacles. The challange of this game jam was a song theme which was 'Sweet Dreams' by Eurythmics. The random game mechaics we were given were; Scarce Resource, Game Keeps Gets Harder Until You Die, Switch Modes. Designers - Jamie Lamb, Owen Whitley Artists - Danii Savage, Grace Jones

www.cooperdesigns.co.uk/freshapp

In this virtual reality experience you play as the prime minister making decisions about how the UK exits the EU. You will make the decisions on a number of topics that relate to Brexit. You have to make sure that you are able to please both the UK and EU or you will be voted out of office from a vote of No Confidence. Will you come to an agreement or will the UK exit with a no deal scenario. This project was displayed at the UWE degree show and won the award for the most innovative Creative Media Design final project by The Great State.

www.cooperdesigns.co.uk/freshapp

< Previous Project

Prime Time

Next project >

Prime Time uses Virtual Reality to simulate the semi-automated, pressurised work environment of an Amazon Fulfilment centre. It embeds the player in the relentless machinic system, replicating the real experience of working in an environment where their every action is closely monitored. They are expected to meet impossible time pressures which are enforced by a punitive system that adds points to their record based on performance, which is constantly surveilled, three points results in employment termination. Through research and investigation, Prime Time exposes the practises that Amazon’s tours and highly polished advertisements won’t. The experience presents the 21st century equivalent of industrial factory work, a new model of tailorist managerial practises where your boss is a piece of software that is unable to be empathetic, forgiving, flexible and regulates your every breathing moment and transforms you into a mere appendage of the computational industrial system. The simulation includes clues which the player may discover amongst the products they must stow, which are suggestive of less than legal activities from their employer involving tax, employee rights, freedom of information and customer privacy.

www.cooperdesigns.co.uk/freshapp
